org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel

Class ViewModelCollection<T extends ViewModel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel.Component
      • org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel.ViewModelCollection<T>

  • public class ViewModelCollection<T extends ViewModel>
extends Component
    A collection of ViewModels. Provides an array adapter for use in adapter views. Can notify listeners of changing item checked states using ItemCheckedEventArg.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewModelCollection(Context context)
      Construct a ViewModelCollection for a context, using an internal backing store.

    • Method Detail

      • getBackingStore

        public java.util.List<T> getBackingStore()
        Get the backing store for this ViewModelCollection. Note that the backing store returned by this function is a copy of the internal backing store, and can not be used to edit the underlying data. Use functions of ViewModelCollection to edit the underlying data.
        Returns:
        The backing store.

      • getArrayAdapter

        public  getArrayAdapter()
        Get the array adapter created by this ViewModelCollection.
        Returns:
        The array adapter.

      • getCheckedItems

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getCheckedItems()
        Returns a list of positions of checked items in this view model collection. Note that the list returned by this function is a copy of the underlying data, and can not be used to check/uncheck items. Use functions of ViewModelCollection to make changes to the underlying data.
        Returns:
        A list of positions of checked items in this view model collection. Empty list if nothing is checked.

      • isItemChecked

        public boolean isItemChecked(int position)
        Checks if an item at the given position is checked.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the item.
        Returns:
        True if the item at the given position is checked. False otherwise.

      • removeCheckedItem

        public boolean removeCheckedItem(int position)
        Remove the item at the given position from the list of checked items.
        Parameters:
        position - The item position.
        Returns:
        True if the item at the given position was previously checked, and is now unchecked. False otherwise.

      • removeCheckedItems

        public boolean removeCheckedItems(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> positions)
        Remove all the the items at positions given by a collection from the list of checked items.
        Parameters:
        positions - A collection representing the positions of the checked items to remove.
        Returns:
        True is any of the items given by the positions collection was previously checked, and is now unchecked. False otherwise.

      • removeCheckedItems

        public boolean removeCheckedItems(int... positions)
        Remove all the the items at positions given by the argument list from the list of checked items.
        Parameters:
        positions - The positions of the checked items to remove.
        Returns:
        True is any of the items given by the positions was previously checked, and is now unchecked. False otherwise.

      • setCheckedItem

        public void setCheckedItem(int position)
        Set the item at a give position as the only checked item. Remove any othe items that were previously checked from the list of checked items.
        Parameters:
        position - The item position.
